original_text: Yea, the fir trees rejoice at thee, and the cedars of Lebanon, saying, Since thou art laid down, no feller is come up against us.
korean_text: 향나무와 레바논의 백향목도 너로 말미암아 기뻐하여 이르기를 네가 넘어져 있은즉 올라와서 우리를 베어 버릴 자 없다 하는도다

sentences.original_text: Yea, fir trees rejoice at thee
saying, Since thou art laid down,
no feller is come up against us.
